reference: Data come from via scraping job of https://www.nber.org/research/data/us-business-cycle-expansions-and-contractions
description:
Description
Data on U.S. recessions, past to present. Data include information on contraction,
expansion, and cycle.
title: United States Recessions, 1855-present

parameters.prev_t2p: previous trough to this peak (in months)
parameters.trough: the year-month of the trough, as a date
parameters.peak: the year-month of the peak, as a date

format: A data frame with 35 observations on the following 8 variables.
